creator: Reinalda, Bob, author.$$QReinalda, Bob
publisher: Abingdon, Oxon ; New York, NY : Routledge
description: "Providing a comprehensive overview of two centuries of international civil servants and international secretariats, this book reveals how international secretariats have emerged and evolved, focusing on both structures (international public administrations) and the practitioners (international civil servants)"-- Provided by publisher.
